name: Cell Shooter
description:
A very simple endless shooter.

Features:

  • Randomly spawning enemies
  • 4 types of enemies
    • Melee
    • Shooter
    • Speedy
    • Boss
  • Extremely immersive and challenging gameplay
  • High-budget graphics and effects (as seen on the screenshot)
  • One powerup
  • That's all

Planned:

  • More weapons
  • More powerups
  • Continuously increasing difficulty
